org.anyframe.idgen.impl.strategy
Class AbstractStrategy

java.lang.Object
  org.anyframe.idgen.impl.strategy.AbstractStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
IdGenStrategy
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClassNameStrategy, MixStrategy, PackageNameStrategy, PackageStrategy, TimestampStrategy
public abstract class AbstractStrategy
extends Object
implements IdGenStrategy

AbstractStrategy is a abstract class for define several kind of strategy(eg. ClassNameStrategy, MixStrategy and so on.) This class provide functionality that can make padded id using maxCiphers, paggingChar, ignoreMaxCiphers. When make a class that extends this class, Must override makeId() method and define logic about making for id.

Author:
Jonghwan Jeong
